author: gerdogdu
msg: remove conversation context from threadlocal after request is destroyed

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing JIRA Issue #1464: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1464. Use 31 bits in computing the hash instead of 27. Should improve the distribution of symbols in a very large table. Thanks to Roland Illig for spotting this issue.

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing JIRA Issue #1464: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1464. Use 31 bits in computing the hash instead of 27. Should improve the distribution of symbols in a very large table. Thanks to Roland Illig for spotting this issue.

author: buscob
msg: Allows the current party name be visible again on the header bar. It was not visible any more after the addition of the waiting icon.
